Dragica Vujadinovic has built her academic career at the Faculty of Law of the University of Belgrade since 1979.            

            Dragica VujadinoviÃ„â€¡ has been working as a Full Professor since 2005, at the Faculty of Law of the University of Belgrade, teaching Political and Legal Theories and Gender Studies at undergraduate studies, and Introduction into the EU  Political System, at Master in European Integration.
